description: Getting a list of micro actions

parameters.name: levels
parameters.description: Filter actions by level (micro, meso or macro)

parameters.name: domains_ids
parameters.description: Filter actions by socio cultural domain

requests.curl:
curl "http://umdp-cabo-verde.herokuapp.com/api/actions?levels[]=micro" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json; application/undp-cabo-verde-v1+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Host: undp-cabo-verde.herokuapp.com" \
	-H "Cookie: "
